modName: aMidianBorn Textures For Immersive Armors and Lore-Friendly Armor Pack
summary: This mod allows the textures from aMidianBorn Book of Silence to show up on some of the armors from the Lore-Friendly Armor Pack and Immersive Armors.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#C8BFA5][b]aMidianBorn Textures For Immersive Armors and Lore-Friendly Armor Pack[/b][/color][/size]
This mod allows the textures from aMidianBorn Book of Silence to show up on some of the armors from the Lore-Friendly Armor Pack and Immersive Armors.

[size=4][color=#C8BFA5][b]Armor Sets Updated[/b][/color][/size]
Ancient Barbarian
Barbarian
Dwarven Mage
Mercenary
Ranger
Warchief*
Heroic Imperial (torso only)
Vanguard* (torso only)

* These armors mainly use textures for which there is no aMidianBorn equivalent, so unfortunately they will still have several lower quality textures. I did the best I could with what I had.

[size=4][color=#C8BFA5][b]Dependencies[/b][/color][/size]
This is not a stand-alone mod. You MUST first install either the Lore-Friendly Armor Pack or Immersive Armors, and you MUST also install the textures from aMidianBorn Book of Silence so that the normal maps will show up correctly.

You need ONE of the following:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors[/url] (recommended)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6684]Lore-Friendly Armor Pack[/url] (no longer actively supported)

and you also need:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]

If you already had these mods, you're all set--just install this one and enjoy your new high-res lore-friendly armors!

If you installed the aMidianBorn textures individually, there is no need to get the Book of Silence too. They just have to be installed one way or another.


[size=4][color=#C8BFA5][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]
aMidianBorn Book of Silence was created by CaBaL120, and the Lore-Friendly Armor Pack was created by rahman530. Immersive Armors is by hothtrooper44, although this mod only updates textures for rahman530's armors.

The work of combining these mods was done by Deandra, aka Merilia.

This mod was created with the permission of CaBaL, and you are not permitted to use these files without CaBaL's permission. Also, this file may not be uploaded on any other sites.

[size=4][color=#C8BFA5][b]Video[/b][/color][/size]
Thanks to Brodual for creating this video!
[youtube]VMe8MU8Pw0w[/youtube]
author: Deandra and CaBaL
